scripts.lint: cd client && npm run lint && cd ../server && npm run lint
scripts.test: cd client && npm run test && cd ../server && npm run test
scripts.clear:server: cd server && rimraf public dist && cd ..
scripts.build:client: cd client && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build:client-prod: cd client && npm run build:prod && cd ..
scripts.build:server: cd server && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build:dev: npm run clear:client && npm run clear:server && npm run build:client && npm run build:server && npm run copy:public
scripts.build:prod: npm run clear:client && npm run clear:server && npm run build:client-prod && npm run build:server && npm run copy:public
